 Thanks Frank, I heard a voice, not my mothers, but they said her name, =
it was number 120310, they said, "Elaine Stuart, for Bonnie" the other was =
someone singing, "Let me play some bad music" good job. sf

Subject: [EVP-ITC] More reverse speech [8 Attachments]

          =C2=A0   =
                                         [Attachment(s) from Frank Sumption=
 included below]                       
=C2=A0It's actually only two voices=
, but wiht the wave to mp3 conversion and reversals, makes it look like mor=
e. When I get a weird statelment, like the bad mitten voice, I reverse it t=
o see if it makes sense that way. I don't reverse all voices, just too time=
 consumming. The sound editor is just Windows Sound Recorder. Programs--ace=
ssories--entertainment--sound recorder is the path. It's free and you can r=
ecord, and do the wave to mp3 conversion, add echo, do reversals, cut and p=
aste, just basic editing. 
  =C2=A0
 F-S

<div> It'=
s actually only two voices, but wiht the wave to mp3 conversion and reversa=
ls, makes it look like more. When I get a weird statelment, like the bad mi=
tten voice, I reverse it to see if it makes sense that way. I don't reverse=
 all voices, just too time consumming. The sound editor is just Windows Sou=
nd Recorder. Programs--acessories--entertainment--sound recorder is the pat=
h. It's free and you can record, and do the wave to mp3 conversion, add ech=
o, do reversals, cut and paste, just basic editing. </div>
